title: The Road back
creator_credit: Vauxhall Motors and Luton and Dunstable Hospital
brief_description: The rehabilitation of injured employees at a large industrial organisation. The emphasis is on the severe injuries or illnesses which threaten chronic disablement and unemployment. How this can be greatly relieved or overcome by planned remedial work, with specially adapted machines and appliances under specialist medical supervision.
